product_name: The North Face Stella Grace Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Enjoy protection from the wind and drizzle on your commute in The North Face Stella Grace Rain Jacket for women. It's made from waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) fabric. Nylon taffeta lining glides on easily over a sweater or fleece. Center-front zipper has a snap-flap closure. Removable hood and belt let you customize your look. Internal media pocket has cord guide. Stella Grace rain jacket for women from The North Face offers zippered hand pockets to secure your essentials.
short_description: Enjoy protection from the wind and drizzle on your commute in The North Face Stella Grace Rain Jacket for women. It's made from waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) fabric.
